alert.note: Alert for Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 11:27PM AKST until December 29 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Strong winds, heavy snow and blowing snow occuring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Power lines and building could be damaged. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches are expected. Visibility will be one quarter mile or less at times. Wind will gust to 65 mph. * WHERE...Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 60 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. The strongest winds and lowest visibility are now developing. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
